Verses: 1 devane, En Kooppidudhalaikkettu, En Vinnappaththaik Gavaniyum.
2 en Irudhayam Thoiyumpodhu Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharaththilirundhu Ummai Nokkik Kooppiduven; Enakku Ettaadha Uyaramaana Kanmalaiyil Ennaik Kondupoividum.
3 neer Enakku Adaikkalamum, Saththuruvukku Edhire Belaththa Thurugamumaayirundheer.
4 naan Ummudaiya Koodaaraththil Sadhaakaalamum Thanguven; Umadhu Settaigalin Maraivile Vandhu Adaiven. (selaa.)
5 devane, Neer En Poruththanaigalaik Ketteer; Umadhu Naamaththirkup Bayappadugiravargalin Sudhandharaththai Enakkuth Thandheer.
6 raajaavin Naatkalode Naatkalaik Koottuveer; Avar Varushangal Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Irukkum.
7 avar Devanukku Munbaaga Endrendraikkum Nilaiththiruppaar; Thayaiyum Unmaiyum Avaraik Kaakkak Kattalaiyidum.
8 ippadiye Thinamum En Poruththanaigalai Naan Seluththumbadiyaaga, Umadhu Naamaththai Endraikkum Keerththanampannuven.
